EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2330.C.Email 7 - Zero emission customer testimon
EmailTemplate.subject: This innovation enabled Tele2 to deploy 4G for 41% less carbon emissions
EmailTemplate.textOnly: How a software upgrade eliminated the need for a new LTE network Zero emission radio access networks <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2389.Tele2.4G.upgrade.html]]> RF sharing simplifies 4G deployment for Tele2 Estonia Novel software enabled Tele2 Estonia to be among the first to deploy 4G on 2.1 GHz, a band usually reserved for 3G. Network capacity, coverage and sustainability were all boosted. Read the success story <[[https://pages.nokia.com/2389.Tele2.4G.upgrade.html]]> ► Using the same shared hardware to handle 3G and 4G traffic, Tele2 avoided the need to build a new network for LTE. And using the same frequency for 4G meant no new base station sites had to be created, all of which resulted in 41 percent lower carbon emissions than a conventional 4G roll out. © 2016 Nokia.
